name: Real Drift Mustang Game HD Pro
name_original: Real Drift Mustang Game HD Pro
description:
Real Car Drift Game Adventure Awaits You With Turbo Engines Ford Mustang!
Car Drift Game with a new map and cars waiting for you. Ford Mustang model vehicles with turbo engines of the latest model in a profitable way, you can drift in sharp bends.
Difficult to control the car !.

Game Features:
* HD Quality Map snowy terrain
* Sharp curvy roads
* Real turbo engine sounds
* Full HD Ford Mustang Model
* Quality graphics from each other
* Steering wheel, gas and brake pedals with full control
* Internal and external drive angles with genuine driving pleasure!
